projects.title: Personal Portfolio Website Application
projects.shortDescription: Modern portfolio website built with Angular and custom design system
projects.fullDescription: Advanced portfolio website showcasing frontend development expertise. Features include a custom design system, signal-based state management, SSR optimization, and multi-language support. Implements modern Angular 19 features including standalone components, new control flow, and signals for reactive state management.
features: Custom design system with theme support

projects.title: DNA Analysis Management System
projects.shortDescription: System for Italian Ministry of Justice's Joint Forces Command
projects.fullDescription: Worked on three interconnected projects for the Italian Ministry of Justice's Joint Forces Command, focusing on DNA analysis management systems. Implemented critical change requests, conducted thorough bug fixes, developed new features, and ensured seamless deployment across all projects.

projects.title: Banking Contract Management System
projects.shortDescription: Internal application for mass CSV upload of loans and mortgages contract data
projects.fullDescription: Developed and maintained an internal application for ICCREA, a major Italian banking institution, that enables mass upload and processing of CSV files containing contractual data for mortgages and loans. Enhanced frontend performance and implemented new features under tight deadlines.

projects.title: Insurance Branch Dashboard System
projects.shortDescription: Centralized dashboard tool for insurance company branch management
projects.fullDescription: Developed a comprehensive dashboard system for a major insurance company that centralizes branch management and monitoring. The project achieved an impressive 80% test coverage across 116,000 lines of code, significantly improved development efficiency through mentoring junior developers, and successfully integrated a customized PrimeNG WYSIWYG editor. The system serves as a central hub for branch operations, data visualization, and performance monitoring.

projects.title: Italian Navy submarine CRM Portal
projects.shortDescription: CRM portal section for the Italian Ministry of Defense - Navy
projects.fullDescription: Developed a crucial section of the CRM portal for the Italian Navy, featuring a custom-integrated Ace.js editor component and comprehensive team leadership responsibilities. The project involved managing an 8000+ line codebase, implementing an agile framework, and coordinating with a cross-functional team of 10 members including front-end/back-end developers and database specialists. Key achievements included successful knowledge transfer to junior developers and meeting strict military-grade security requirements.

projects.title: NextIP Call Center CRM
projects.shortDescription: React-based CRM transformation for call center operations
projects.fullDescription: Led the transformation of a legacy PHP monolithic web application into a modern React-based CRM system for call centers. The project achieved a 20% increase in application speed through modern front-end architecture and optimized state management. The new system provided enhanced user experience and improved call center efficiency through real-time updates and streamlined workflows.

projects.title: Corporate Decision Making Suite
projects.shortDescription: Mobile and web application suite for enterprise decision making
projects.fullDescription: Developed a comprehensive suite of mobile and web applications focused on corporate decision-making processes. As the senior team member, produced over 50 pages of technical documentation and maintained post-release developments. Each application in the suite grew to over 10,000 lines of code, demonstrating robust architecture and maintainability. The system facilitated data-driven decision making across multiple organizational levels.

projects.title: EmmeLibri B2B Distribution ERP
projects.shortDescription: Front end ERP system for B2B book distribution
projects.fullDescription: Enhanced and maintained a comprehensive ERP system for B2B book distribution, achieving a 50% reduction in system bugs through methodical code maintenance and implementing strategic change requests. Successfully trained team members on Angular, reducing onboarding time by 25% and improving overall team productivity. The system managed complex book distribution workflows and inventory management processes.

projects.title: Aircraft Maintenance Management System
projects.fullDescription: Restructured a legacy aircraft maintenance management application into a modern Single Page Application using Angular, resulting in a 20% performance improvement. The system manages maintenance schedules, part inventory, and compliance requirements for aircraft maintenance operations. The modernization effort included implementing real-time updates, improved user interface, and enhanced data visualization capabilities.

projects.title: PSD2 Bank Access Management Interface
projects.shortDescription: Banking access management system compliant with PSD2 regulations
projects.fullDescription: Developed a comprehensive PSD2-compliant banking access management interface, successfully leading a team of 4 junior developers. The project involved designing application flows based on complex architectural specifications and creating detailed functional analysis documentation. Met all delivery deadlines while maintaining high code quality and regulatory compliance. The system manages secure banking access, authentication, and transaction authorization according to EU PSD2 standards.

projects.title: Medical Devices Retail System
projects.shortDescription: Integrated retail system for medical acoustic devices sales for AMPLIFON APAC
projects.fullDescription: Created a web interface for an APAC oriented integrated medical acoustic devices retail sales system for the worldwide leaders of the market (Amplifon). Successfully trained a junior engineer, achieving full autonomy in Angular development within just 2 months. Reviewed and improved technical documentation, providing valuable front-end implementation suggestions. The system manages inventory, sales, and compliance requirements specific to medical device retail operations.

projects.title: Insurance Management Platform
projects.shortDescription: Core insurance management system for Vittoria Assicurazioni
projects.fullDescription: Contributed to the development of a comprehensive insurance management platform for Vittoria Assicurazioni. The system handles policy management, claims processing, and customer relationship management. Implemented modern front-end architecture using Angular, ensuring responsive design and optimal performance across all devices.

projects.title: Clinical Laboratory IVD LIS System
projects.shortDescription: Web application for clinical laboratory management
projects.fullDescription: Developed an IVD LIS (In Vitro Diagnostic Laboratory Information System) web application for clinical laboratories, implementing the interface using Angular and PrimeNG. Created comprehensive project documentation following ISO 13485:2012 standards, including Software Design Specification (SDS) and Test Protocol (TP) documentation. The system manages laboratory workflows, test results, and quality control processes.

experiences.description: Development of DNA analysis management systems for the Italian Ministry of Justice. Implemented critical features and ensured seamless integration across multiple complex applications.
Worked on multiple high-profile projects including ICCREA banking systems and GFT insurance platforms. Led development teams and mentored junior developers.

experiences.description: Developed an integrated document management system for the public sector and created AI-powered chatbot solutions.

professionalSummary.shortBio: Frontend developer specializing in Angular and React, with extensive experience in enterprise applications and public sector projects.
